title: Sample English Reading
description: A sample document for testing the app

sentences.english: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
sentences.chinese: 敏捷的棕色狐狸跳过懒狗。

highlightWords.englishDefinition: Moving fast or doing something in a short time.
Unwilling to work or use energy; showing a lack of effort or care.

sentences.english: Reading is a fundamental skill that opens doors to knowledge and imagination.
sentences.chinese: 阅读是一项基本技能，它为知识和想象力打开大门。

highlightWords.englishDefinition: Forming a necessary base or core; of central importance.
The faculty or action of forming new ideas, or images or concepts of external objects not present to the senses.

sentences.english: Technology has revolutionized the way we communicate with each other.
sentences.chinese: 科技已经彻底改变了我们彼此交流的方式。

highlightWords.englishDefinition: To change something completely and fundamentally.
To share or exchange information, news, or ideas.

sentences.english: Practice makes perfect when learning a new language.
sentences.chinese: 学习一门新语言时，熟能生巧。

highlightWords.englishDefinition: The actual application or use of an idea, belief, or method, as opposed to theories relating to it.

sentences.english: Perseverance is the key to achieving your goals in life.
sentences.chinese: 坚持不懈是实现人生目标的关键。

highlightWords.englishDefinition: Continued effort to do or achieve something despite difficulties, failure, or opposition.
To successfully reach or accomplish a goal or desired result.
